column1: #Text=Whether simulating the aerodynamics of an F1 racing car orthe noise generated by a jet engine Simcenter customers need on-demandsuper-computer resources.
#Text=We are changing the way our customers run andinteract with multi-physics high fidelity simulations.
#Text=As part of the"Simcenter Common Components, Services & Technologies (C2ST)" group youwill play a critical role in this transformation.

#Text=What you will need to succeed Proven experience researching, designing, and implementing micro-services delivering self-contained business functionality within a SaaS product Understand the importance of high availability and observability Considers security and user data protection throughout the software development lifecycle Have the desire to learn new technologies and develop new skills Experience operating a 24x7, global, highly available secure SaaS environment Must be a phenomenal teammate with excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to work with people at all levelsKnowledge, Skills and Abilities Master's Degree or commensurate experience in computer science or related field. 3+ years of professional experience developing services and deploying infrastructure in AWS cloud platform Confirmed skills on AWS services (EC2, S3, IAM, SNS, SQS, Lambda, Cloud Front, Cloud Watch, Cloud Formation, Scalability, High Availability) AWS Associate/Professional certification is an added advantage Experience applying monitoring techniques for early problem detection and reporting.

#Text=To learn more, click here Proven experience researching, designing, and implementing micro-services delivering self-contained business functionality within a SaaS product Understand the importance of high availability and observability Have the desire to learn new technologies and develop new skills Experience operating a 24x7, global, highly available secure SaaS environment Must be a phenomenal teammate with excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to work with people at all levels Master's Degree or commensurate experience in computer science or related field 3+ years of professional experience developing services and deploying infrastructure in AWS cloud platform Confirmed skills on AWS services (EC2, S3, IAM, SNS, SQS, Lambda, Cloud Front, Cloud Watch, Cloud Formation, Scalability, High Availability) AWS Associate/Professional certification is an added advantage Experience applying monitoring techniques for early problem detection and reporting Proficient with various programming languages such as Python & JavaScript Experience using CI/CD pipelines (GitLab experience is an advantage) Experience with multi-team, collaborative software development including source control and collaborative design and code reviews Your contributions willchange the way designers and engineers develop products Thesalary range for this position is $95,800 to $172,400 and this role is eligibleto earn incentive compensation In addition, thisposition is eligible for time off in accordance with Company policies,including paid sick leave, paid parental leave, PTO (for non-exempt employees)or non-accrued flexible vacation (for exempt employees)
